Title: Requires just cause for employment termination and restricts the use of electronic monitoring for disciplinary purposes
Summary: Requires just cause for employment termination and restricts the use of electronic monitoring for disciplinary purposes; requires employers to provide just cause for discharging employees, with exceptions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring just cause for employment termination and restricting the use of electronic monitoring for disciplinary purposes
